title: PS4 controller to Xbox 360 Controller [Halloweenpsycho]
description:
Have you had issues with using your PS4 controller on your pc, or the game your trying to play just doesn't recognize your PS4 controller ? Well look no further. The PS4 controller can be plugged into your pc and used for games and or to charge your controller, however most games may not recognize your PS4 controller. Well i devised a method to eliminate this by forcing your pc to recognize your PS4 controller as a 360 controller and function with all games that may use a controller, as well you will be able to still charge your controller as well. You can use your PS4 controller Wired, or wireless with a 2.1 Bluetooth dongle or higher. So enjoy your favorite games with your favorite controller with out the need for extra software to emulate the 360 functionality. PS4 it's finally here.

Look for more ups from Halloweenpsycho

please leave your comments for the next downloader.
